nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that End of Service tab visibility changes based on employee offboarding status
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab in employee profile
checks.assertion: EOS tab should be hidden for offboarded employees and visible for active employees

checks.description: Verify that EOS tab displays appropriate state indicator when employee is removed from payroll
checks.selector_hint: EOS tab element or disabled state indicator
checks.assertion: Tab should show disabled or hidden state with visual indicator

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that gratuity file download displays clear month identification and labeling
checks.selector_hint: Month label or date field in gratuity file download interface
checks.assertion: Month should be clearly labeled with format showing month and year (e.g., 'March 2024')

checks.description: Verify that gratuity data displayed in employee profile matches downloaded file data
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount field in both profile and file download
checks.assertion: Gratuity values should match between employee profile view and downloaded file

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that hiring date field displays appropriate state when employee has payroll transaction history
checks.selector_hint: Hiring date input field in employee profile
checks.assertion: Field should show disabled state or error message when payroll transactions exist

checks.description: Verify that hiring date modification is restricted when payroll history exists
checks.selector_hint: Hiring date field edit capability or lock indicator
checks.assertion: Field should be read-only or display restriction message for employees with payroll history

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that gratuity report download provides period selection options
checks.selector_hint: Date range picker or period selection dropdown in gratuity file download
checks.assertion: Should display options to select custom date ranges or monthly periods

checks.description: Verify that historical gratuity data options are available for multiple years
checks.selector_hint: Year or date range selector in gratuity report interface
checks.assertion: Should allow selection of historical periods spanning multiple years (2020-2023)

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template dropdown
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity field option in custom report field selector
checks.assertion: Gratuity field should be selectable in custom report template builder

checks.description: Verify that Gratuity field displays appropriate values or zero state based on EOS processing
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity value display in custom report output
checks.assertion: Should show 0 for employees without processed EOS, and actual gratuity for those with EOS completed

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that payroll accrual reports are available only for most recent closed cycle
checks.selector_hint: Accrual report download or cycle selector
checks.assertion: Should display reports only for the latest closed payroll cycle

checks.description: Verify that historical accrual reports for previous months show disabled or unavailable state
checks.selector_hint: Previous month accrual report option or disabled state indicator
checks.assertion: Historical accrual reports should appear disabled or unavailable

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that navigation to EOS leave encashment configuration is accessible
checks.selector_hint: EOS settings or configuration menu item
checks.assertion: Should navigate to End of Service configuration section

checks.description: Verify that leave encashment daily wage calculation setting displays current selection
checks.selector_hint: Daily wage calculation dropdown or radio button in EOS settings
checks.assertion: Should display selected calculation method (Basic / Working days or Basic + allowances / working days)

checks.description: Verify that End of Service Eligibility section reflects leave encashment configuration changes
checks.selector_hint: EOS Eligibility section display showing calculation basis
checks.assertion: Should update to show selected calculation method after configuration change

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that pro-rated EOS amounts are displayed with appropriate decimal precision
checks.selector_hint: Pro-rated amount field in EOS calculation
checks.assertion: Should display amounts with correct decimal precision (not truncated or rounded incorrectly)

checks.description: Verify that daily wage calculation (basic + allowances / 30) maintains precision
checks.selector_hint: Daily wage or pro-rated calculation display
checks.assertion: Should show precise decimal values without rounding errors

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that gratuity accrual report displays clear column headers and definitions
checks.selector_hint: Column headers in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: Should display 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount at end of payroll cycle' with clear labels

checks.description: Verify that accrual report values are clearly distinguished between previous and current cycle
checks.selector_hint: Accrual amount values in report columns
checks.assertion: Should clearly show different values for previous cycle close vs current cycle end

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify that EOS tenure calculation displays service duration with unpaid leave deductions shown separately
checks.selector_hint: Tenure or service duration field in EOS calculation
checks.assertion: Should display gross tenure, unpaid leave days, and net tenure separately

checks.description: Verify that tenure calculation breakdown is visible and transparent
checks.selector_hint: Tenure calculation breakdown section
checks.assertion: Should show detailed breakdown of how service duration is calculated

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that final settlement amount is clearly displayed in EOS calculation
checks.selector_hint: Final settlement amount field in EOS
checks.assertion: Should display final settlement amount prominently

checks.description: Verify that settlement breakdown shows all components and adjustments
checks.selector_hint: Settlement breakdown section showing gratuity, pro-rated salary, leave encashment, expenses
checks.assertion: Should display all components and show how previously paid amounts are deducted

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that gratuity accrual closing balance of one month matches opening balance of next month
checks.selector_hint: Opening and closing balance fields in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: Closing balance of month N should equal opening balance of month N+1

checks.description: Verify that new hire employees do not appear in accrual reports before their hire date
checks.selector_hint: Employee list in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: New hire should not appear in accrual reports for periods before hire date

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that gratuity amount is displayed in EOS calculation
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount field in EOS
checks.assertion: Should display calculated gratuity amount

checks.description: Verify that gratuity calculation methodology is transparent or documented
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity calculation details or help text
checks.assertion: Should provide visibility into how gratuity is calculated

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that gratuity report displays available information fields
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity report field selector or column options
checks.assertion: Should display options for report fields and customization

checks.description: Verify that days of service information is available in gratuity report
checks.selector_hint: Days of service column or field in gratuity report
checks.assertion: Should display days of service for each employee

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify that leave calculation method options are available in EOS configuration
checks.selector_hint: Leave calculation method dropdown or selection in EOS settings
checks.assertion: Should provide options for different leave proration methods

checks.description: Verify that leave days calculation is displayed in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Leave days field in EOS calculation
checks.assertion: Should display calculated leave days based on selected method

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that EOS processed amount is displayed in EOS tab
checks.selector_hint: Processed amount field in EOS tab
checks.assertion: Should display processed EOS amount (not 0 AED when transaction exists)

checks.description: Verify that EOS transaction amounts are consistent across different views
checks.selector_hint: Processed amount in EOS tab, transaction page, and payroll table
checks.assertion: Amount should be the same across EOS tab, transaction page, and payroll table views

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify that EOS processing is accessible for Qatar clients
checks.selector_hint: EOS menu or navigation option
checks.assertion: Should navigate to EOS processing section for non-KSA employees

checks.description: Verify that gratuity description is displayed in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity description or help text in EOS
checks.assertion: Should display gratuity description (may reference KSA law or be generic)

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify that unpaid leave handling options are available in leave policy configuration
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid leave exclusion option in leave policy settings
checks.assertion: Should provide option to exclude or include unpaid leave in EOS calculations

checks.description: Verify that service duration calculation is displayed in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Total service duration field in EOS
checks.assertion: Should display calculated service duration based on hire and departure dates

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify that Finance > Payroll table navigation path is accessible
checks.selector_hint: Finance menu item and Payroll table submenu
checks.assertion: Should navigate to Payroll table from Finance menu

checks.description: Verify that employee selection is available in Payroll table
checks.selector_hint: Employee selector or list in Payroll table
checks.assertion: Should allow selection of employees from payroll table

checks.description: Verify that End of Service tab is accessible in employee profile
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab in employee profile
checks.assertion: Should display End of Service tab in employee profile

checks.description: Verify that departure date field is available in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Departure date input field
checks.assertion: Should display departure date input field

checks.description: Verify that departure reason options are available
checks.selector_hint: Departure reason dropdown or selection
checks.assertion: Should provide departure reason selection options

checks.description: Verify that contract type options are available
checks.selector_hint: Contract type dropdown or selection
checks.assertion: Should provide contract type selection options (limited/unlimited)

checks.description: Verify that EOS calculation can be triggered
checks.selector_hint: Calculate or Submit button in EOS
checks.assertion: Should display button to calculate End of Service amount

checks.description: Verify that additions section is available for review
checks.selector_hint: Additions section in EOS calculation
checks.assertion: Should display additions section for review

checks.description: Verify that deductions can be added or edited
checks.selector_hint: Deductions section with add/edit controls
checks.assertion: Should allow adding or editing deductions

nav.canonical: Employee Profile > End of Service > Contract Type > Reason for Departure

checks.description: Verify that employee profile is accessible
checks.selector_hint: Employee profile link or navigation
checks.assertion: Should navigate to employee profile

checks.description: Verify that End of Service section is visible in employee profile
checks.selector_hint: End of Service section or tab
checks.assertion: Should display End of Service section in profile

checks.description: Verify that contract type can be selected in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Contract type dropdown or radio buttons
checks.assertion: Should provide contract type selection options

checks.description: Verify that reason for departure can be selected
checks.selector_hint: Reason for departure dropdown or selection
checks.assertion: Should provide departure reason selection options

checks.description: Verify that gratuity amount is calculated and displayed
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount display field
checks.assertion: Should display calculated gratuity amount based on MOHRE law
